mapper.select: SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, MEMBER.member_num, member_nick FROM board, member WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NUM = 12 AND board.member_num = MEMBER.member_num ORDER BY board_num DESC)) WHERE n BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, MEMBER.member_num, member_nick FROM board, member and BOARD_TYPE_NUM = 12 AND board.member_num = MEMBER.member_num ORDER BY board_num DESC)) where n BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

choose.when: where member_nick like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.insert: insert into board(board_num,title,content,bdate,views,board_type_num,member_num) values((select nvl(max(board_num), 0)+1 from board), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 12, 1)

insert into see(see_num,see_pet,see_find_loc,see_find_date,board_num) values((select nvl(max(see_num), 0)+1 from see),#{see_pet},#{see_find_loc},#{see_find_date},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
insert into picture(picture_file_num, picture_fname, board_num) values((select nvl(max(picture_file_num), 0)+1 from picture),#{picture_fname},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
mapper.select: select * from see s, board b, picture p, member m where s.board_num = b.board_num and p.board_num = b.board_num and m.member_num = b.member_num and b.board_num=#{board_num}

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, MEMBER.member_num, member_nick FROM board, member WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NUM = 12 AND board.member_num = MEMBER.member_num ORDER BY board_num DESC))

choose.when: where member_nick like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.update: update board set views = views+1 where board_num = #{board_num} and board_type_num = 12
update see set see_pet = #{see_pet}, see_find_loc = #{see_find_loc}, see_find_date = #{see_find_date} where board_num = #{board_num}
update board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where board_num = #{board_num}
update picture set picture_fname = #{picture_fname} where board_num = #{board_num}
